A story about a mouse who becomes a master of disguise and goes on a secret mission to steal cheese from a castle.
A tale of a mouse who discovers a magical door that leads to a world of endlessess, but must use his wits to navigate the dangers that lurk.
A fable about a mouse who is tired of living in the shadows and sets out to become the bravest mouse in the land, facing challenges and obstacles along the way.
A comedy about a mouse who becomes a celebrity and must navigate the world of fame and fortune, all while trying to keep his mouse-like features hidden.
A mystery about a mouse who is accused of stealing a valuable piece of jewelry and must prove his innocence before he is sent to prison.
